alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 11:35AM CST until March 08 at 7:42PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Steelville. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Valley Park. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.5 feet, Buder Park and the recreation park at the water plant floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 19.7 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Valley Park 18.0 11.7 16.1 19.7 18.6 14.8 6.8 &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
